com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.rendering.renderable

Class Renderable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.rendering.renderable.Renderable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LayerCameraRenderable, Polygon, RenderablesWrapper

    public abstract class Renderable
extends java.lang.Object
    Class storing information, and only the information. needed to render some OpenGl object.
    Author:
    jlreyes

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        public abstract boolean isVisible(LayerCamera gameCamera)
        Returns true iff this renderable is visible by the given camera.

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(int positionHandle,
        int mvpMatrixHandle,
        int texCoordHandle,
        int texRGBHandle,
        int texAHandle,
        float ratio,
        float[] mvpMatrix,
        float[] viewMatrix,
        float[] modelMatrix,
        float[] projectionMatrix)
        Draws the renderable using the given view, model, and projection matrices. Also takes a handle to the final combined MVP matrix.
        Parameters:
        mvpMatrixHandle - An openGL handle to the combined MVP matrix.
        texCoordHandle - an openGL handle to the texture coordinate.
        texRGBHandle - An openGL handle to the rgb texture uniform
        texAHandle - An openGL handle to the alpha texture uniform.
        ratio - The screen ratio
        mvpMatrix - The mvpMatrix we will store data in.
        viewMatrix - The view matrix.
        modelMatrix - The model matrix.
        projectionMatrix - The projection matrix.

      • updateModelMatrix

        protected void updateModelMatrix(float[] modelMatrix)
        Transforms the model matrix based on stored position, rotation, and scaling values.
